channel.title: Visionary - Community Driven - 100% Bank Tabs - 2011 Era Client - Loads of Conte
channel.description:
[CENTER] [URL=http://"http://visionary317.com"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eKhzxtz.png[/img][/URL]
[B][U][SIZE=3]Server Media:[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SPOILER=Pictures - Click here!] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceJ10/05c1490a12.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceJ43/d785a9714f.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceJ9D/06961ad886.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceJvN/c6e2e38879.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceJAd/64348bac42.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceKr0/5348f0775d.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceKv0/c7acbb7a92.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceKyG/86fbbba09e.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceKCX/de8c2ee713.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceLlu/9737d5c4a2.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceLrO/082776d215.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceLxF/cc3b9ae986.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceLAp/2c9ec93838.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cg4Q4/5a3cc03e07.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cg4z6/b1cb00d427.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cg4rp/169fd9c085.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/cg3Z9/03cdec403f.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceUtD/d973204300.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceLLj/d43939f672.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/ceLAp/2c9ec93838.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W82-Fu6c9ac
[B][U][SIZE=3]Why should you choose to play visionary over other servers?[/SIZE][/U][/B]
A very good question.. But a very simple answer which is, Visionary cares about it's players, it cares about it's economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possibly can to ensure that the players of visionary enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!
The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Visionary on the update-log on the forums. Visionary focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of gameplay that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to their players and just ignores their opinions and even ignores their players when they talk to them.. I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how the bad servers are ran, I have learnt their mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Visionary is the place for you.
[B][U][SIZE=3]Ways you can show your support for Visionary: [/SIZE][/U][/B]
[I]Like/follow/subscribe on our social media:[/I]
- [IMG]http://visionary317.com/site/images/smedia/facebook.png[/img][URL=http://"https://www.facebook.com/pages/Notorious-1-Runescape-Private-Server/426964427426640"]Facebook[/URL] - [IMG]http://visionary317.com/site/assets/img/sm/twitter.png[/img][URL=http://"https://twitter.com/Visionary317"]Twitter[/URL] - [IMG]http://visionary317.com/site/assets/img/sm/yt.png[/img][URL=http://"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJCH26bE95tE5NSdCd1sFhw"]YouTube[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://visionary317.com"][SIZE=3]Click here to begin your adventure![/SIZE][/URL][/CENTER]

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“GuthansRSPS, post:3, topic:549436”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=668338.msg4469788#msg4469788 date=1422333414]
Rather there be pictures than a single video to show off this advertisement.
[/quote]

Click the button above the video for images ;)[/quote]
Oh wow, I flew by that completely - sorry. Good luck with the server though, looks pretty decent I’d say.

Read full topic

[B][U][SIZE=3]Why should you choose to play visionary over other servers?[/SIZE][/U][/B]

A very good question… But a very simple answer which is, Visionary cares about it’s players, it cares about it’s economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possibly can to ensure that the players of visionary enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!

The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Visionary on the update-log on the forums. Visionary focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of gameplay that we know players enjoy PvM, PvP, skilling, you name it we have it!
